meanings.sent1: I resampled the song to hear it one more time.
meanings.sent2: The scientist resampled the water to ensure accurate results.
meanings.sent3: I resampled the ice cream, hoping for a better flavor this time.
meanings.sent4: She resampled her memories, trying to find the missing piece.
meanings.sent5: The artist resampled the colors, creating a new masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To take a new sample of (something)
meanings.sent1: He resampled the soil to check for any changes.
meanings.sent2: The chef resampled the sauce to adjust the seasoning.
meanings.sent3: The student resampled the candies, looking for the tastiest one.
meanings.sent4: The explorer resampled the air, searching for any unusual scents.
meanings.sent5: The farmer resampled the crops, ensuring their quality.
